title: 이달의소녀탐구 #215 (LOONA TV #215)
summary:
Sweet Crazy Love MV shooting begins
0:09 -- Kim Lip and JinSoul take selcas while they wait for Choerry to get her hair done
0:31 -- JinSoul shows the best selca she has ever taken: a terrifying bald picture filter of
her; “It’s my future self!”
0:36 -- Choerry and JinSoul bounce along to catch up with Kim Lip as they go to MV site.
